attributes.action: stop all MPs to claim all expenses, other than travel allowances to and from work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Petition against MPs claiming expense, it is a burden the taxpayers do not have to bear. Everyone in the country manages without claiming expenses from the company they work for, other than travel at the very most. As MPs, you represent the people, therefore you should be lead by example, not against what your job askes you to do, spending public money towards your benfit.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
